episode_event_academy_summer_battle/8301:
Let’s make way for the future by testing
ourselves on what we’ve learned!
episode_event_academy_summer_battle/8302:
Tell me—what “very own treasure” did
you find?
episode_event_academy_summer_battle/8303: Time to show me your passion for studying.
episode_event_academy_summer_battle/8304:
Let’s see who has more enthusiasm—
me or you!
episode_event_academy_summer_battle/8305: I put together a study group. Wanna join?
episode_event_academy_summer_battle/8306:
A question for me? Sure, I’ll respond with all
that I know!
episode_event_academy_summer_battle/8307:
I’m writing a research report on Pokémon!
Wanna help?
episode_event_academy_summer_battle/8308:
I’m recruiting the brightest students for the
Macro Cosmos Group!
episode_event_academy_summer_battle/8309:
You there! If it’s not an inconvenience,
would you lend me a hand?

It’s just for an emergency drill, so don’t
worry about Team Plasma!
episode_event_academy_summer_battle/8310:
Oh, hello! Hello! Alola! This is a great chance
to show me how much you’ve learned!
episode_event_academy_summer_battle/8311:
Time for your test! You really must have
your wits about you.

Now, would you show this old lady how
much you’ve learned?

Well done indeed! Even though I’ve lost,
I find myself with this silly grin!
episode_event_academy_summer_battle/8312:
You made it! I am Bruno, the proctor of
this exam!

We will grind you down with our
superior test!

I could feel the intensity of your will to pass,
even from here!
episode_event_academy_summer_battle/8313: Hey, hey! Wanna study with me?
episode_event_academy_summer_battle/8314:
Maybe making friends at school isn’t so bad
after all.
